description.zh-cn: 美国夏威夷州檀香山市县最大的城区暨首府，位于欧胡岛东南方沿岸。因早期盛产檀香木且大量运往中国而得名。
description.en: The largest census-designated place and capital of Honolulu County, Hawaii, United States. Located on the southeast coast of the island of O'ahu. It was named after the sandalwood trade with China.

description.zh-cn: 美国第44任总统，出生于檀香山。
description.en: The 44th President of the United States, born in Honolulu.

description.zh-cn: 中国近代政治家、革命家，中华民国国父。在檀香山创立兴中会。
description.en: A Chinese statesman and revolutionary, the founding father of the Republic of China. He founded the Revive China Society in Honolulu.

description.zh-cn: 由孙文于1894年在檀香山创立的革命组织，被中国国民党视为奠基。
description.en: A revolutionary organization founded by Sun Yat-sen in Honolulu in 1894, considered the foundation of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的创始政党之一，视兴中会为其奠基。
description.en: One of the founding political parties of the Republic of China, which regards the Revive China Society as its foundation.

description.zh-cn: 美国夏威夷州檀香山的市郡政府，负责主要的市政服务。
description.en: The city-county government of Honolulu, Hawaii, USA, responsible for major municipal services.

description.zh-cn: 政治人物，檀香山市长。
description.en: Politician, Mayor of Honolulu.

description.zh-cn: 中国四川省省会，檀香山的友好城市。
description.en: The capital of Sichuan Province, China, and a sister city of Honolulu.

description.zh-cn: 中国福建省省会，檀香山的友好城市。
description.en: The capital of Fujian Province, China, and a sister city of Honolulu.

description.zh-cn: 美国歌手，在檀香山出生长大。
description.en: American singer, born and raised in Honolulu.

description.zh-cn: 韩国男子团体TOMORROW X TOGETHER成员，出生于檀香山。
description.en: Member of the South Korean boy band TOMORROW X TOGETHER, born in Honolulu.

description.zh-cn: 曾是美国洛矶山脉以西最古老的交响乐团，于2010年12月解散。
description.en: Formerly the oldest symphony orchestra in the United States west of the Rocky Mountains, it was dissolved in December 2010.

description.zh-cn: 美国第44任总统贝拉克·奥巴马于1961年在檀香山出生。
description.en: The 44th U.S. President Barack Obama was born in Honolulu in 1961.

description.zh-cn: 孙文于1894年11月24日在檀香山成立了兴中会。
description.en: Sun Yat-sen founded the Revive China Society in Honolulu on November 24, 1894.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党视兴中会为其奠基，并以其成立日为建党日。
description.en: The Kuomintang considers the Revive China Society as its foundation and adopted its founding date as the party's establishment date.

description.zh-cn: 根据孙文自述，他出生于檀香山伊娃区。
description.en: According to Sun Yat-sen's own account, he was born in the Ewa District of Honolulu.

description.zh-cn: Rick Blangiardi是檀香山市与县的现任市长。
description.en: Rick Blangiardi is the current mayor of the City and County of Honolulu.

description.zh-cn: 檀香山与成都为友好城市。
description.en: Honolulu and Chengdu are sister cities.

description.zh-cn: 檀香山与福州为友好城市。
description.en: Honolulu and Fuzhou are sister cities.

description.zh-cn: 歌手布鲁诺·马尔斯出生于檀香山。
description.en: Singer Bruno Mars was born in Honolulu.

description.zh-cn: 韩国男团成员休宁凯出生于檀香山。
description.en: South Korean boy band member Huening Kai was born in Honolulu.
